extension.summary: Force Close PSMC
extension.description: Part of the PSMC Collection
extension.news: 1.0.0[CR][COLOR crimson]â€¢ [/COLOR]Initial release

extension.summary: A simple all-around Maintenance Tool
extension.description: PSMC's Maintenance does many maintenance functions needed to help with a much smoother PSMC (Kodi) experience without all the fluff. Features include: Auto delete of cache at start up, notifies when packages and thumbs reach a set amount of wasted storage space (you can set and change sizes), cuts down on your devices read/writes on the ROM. Also has Backup/Restore Options, Speed test, and other features!!

extension.summary: Allows you to install PSMC/Kodi Addons directly from GitHub
extension.description: This is a Git Browser for PSMC/Kodi. Install any PSMC/Kodi addon that is developed or distributed through GitHub without all the bloatware!
extension.disclaimer: The author of this addon does NOT host any of the content which is found and has no affiliation with any of the content providers. This addon simply searches github for content. This addon does not form part of the Kodi Media Center. Please do not seek assistance with this addon from any of the Official Kodi Support Channels. Use at your own risk!
extension.news: [COLOR FFFFFF00]- Cosmetic fixes[/COLOR][CR]- Initial release[/COLOR]

extension.summary: Fuzzy Britches v3
extension.description: Part of the PSMC Collection
extension.disclaimer: The author of this add-on does not host any of the content which is found and has no affiliation with any of the content providers. This add-on simply searches websites for content. Use at your own risk![CR]This project uses API's from TMDb, Trakt, Fanart.tv, but is not affiliated nor endorsed by any of their respective ogranizations.[CR]Please support them accordingly.
extension.news: - See Changelog on Tools menu

extension.summary: Playlist Loader
Playlist Loader
extension.description: Playlist Loader
Playlist Loader
extension.news:
1.3.0 - Added default icons. - Added transparency to existing icons for better themes integration. - Added virtual directories feature allowing a better categorization of m3u lists. - Refresh favourites list when moving an item. - Ability to move playlists root and directories sides. - Refresh playlists and directories when moving an item. - Disabled TvDb and MovieDb for now ( waiting for improvements )
1.2.1 - Taking ownership of the addon, see : https://github.com/avigdork/xbmc-avigdork/pull/8#issuecomment-416955692 - Fixed regex => grouping issue when tvg-logo was empty. - Added icon image also when items are grouped. - Regex fix for title containing comas. - Added TheTvDb scan for each lists in contextual menu ( beta ).

extension.summary: Fuzzy Britches v3 Scrapers
extension.description: Scrape common video host for URL's to be playable in PSMC or Kodi, simplifying addon development of video plugins using multi video hosts.
extension.disclaimer: The author is not responsible for the use of this addon. The author is not responsible for the content found using this addon. The author does not host or own any content found within this addon.[CR]The author is in no way affiliated with Kodi, Team Kodi, or the XBMC Foundation.[CR]This is a Non-profit resource, organized solely for educational purposes which is protected under the Fair-Use doctrine of the Copyright Act, Specifically section 107, which does promote freedom of expression, by permitting the unlicensed use of copyright-protected works.
extension.news: - See Changelog on Tools menu

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Resolver enlaces a videos de sitios populares para poder reproducirlos en XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
Επίλυση συνδέσμων κοινών εξυπηρετητών σε μορφή βίντεο ικανό για αναπαραγωγή στο XBMC/Kodi.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Επίλυση συνδέσμων κοινών εξυπηρετητών σε μορφή βίντεο ικανό για αναπαραγωγή στο XBMC/Kodi, απλοποίηση της ανάπτυξης των προσθέτων που χρησιμοποιούν πολλαπλούς εξυπηρετητές για υλικό βίντεο
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.
extension.disclaimer: This script only resolves video content from legitimate file lockers without prejudice. If this script is being used by 3rd parties to resolve content that you feel infringes upon your Intellectual Property then please take your complaints to the actual website or developer linking to such content and not here. This script in no way searches for any content whatsoever.

Το ανωτέρο σενάριο το μόνο που κάνει είναι να επιλύει οπτικοακουστικό περιεχόμενο από νόμιμες πηγές χωρίς προκατάληψη. Εάν το ανωτέρο σενάριο χρησιμοποιηθεί από τρίτους ώστε να επιλύσει περιεχόμενο το οποίο σας προκαλεί αντίδραση ότι παραβιάζει την πνευματική σας ιδιοκτησία παρακαλώ μεταφέρετε τα παραπονά σας στον ιστότοπο τον οποίο βρίσκεται το εν λόγω περιεχόμενο η τον δημιουργό ο οποίος πραγματοποιεί την σύνδεση και όχι εδω. Το σενάριο αυτό ουδεμία περίπτωση πραγματοποιεί αναζήτηση περιεχομένου.

extension.description: Unofficial RealDebrid client. Manage your torrents, unrestricted links and view host statuses all within Kodi.
extension.summary: Unofficial RealDebrid client. Manage your torrents, unrestricted links and view host statuses all within Kodi.
extension.news: v0.5 - added "Play using RealDebrid" to context menu

extension.summary: Script used by skins to show extended media info.
extension.description: This script fetches extended information for several media types (artists, albums, movie sets etc.). Needs skin support.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991
extension.news: Add set details support for Home Window

extension.summary: [COLOR FFFFFF00]COMPLETELEY[/COLOR] redesigned. Skin updated and modded. Added home screen animation [I][COLOR FFE67300]{can be disabled in settings}[/COLOR][/I], new features and views.
extension.description: [COLOR FFFFFF00]COMPLETELEY[/COLOR] redesigned. Skin updated and modded. Added home screen animation [COLOR FFE67300] which can be disabled in settings[/COLOR], new features and views. Created for use with PSMC [I]{a Kodi fork}[/I]. Please give credit to Mike, The Papaw and all others that have contributed.[I][COLOR FFE67300] You will need to enable the Batman GUI SOUNDS in the System Settings if you wish to use them.[/COLOR][/I] [I](themed from AeonNoxSilvo)[/I]
extension.news: [B][I][COLOR FFFFFF00]Skin updated, modded and Completely Redesigned[/COLOR][/I][/B][CR][COLOR FF00D5FF]- Added NEW Home Screen Animation[/COLOR][CR][COLOR FF00D5FF]- Additional Falling Seasons[/COLOR][CR][COLOR FFE67300]Included with v7.9.4 Silvo update by Mike[/COLOR][CR]- Fix Live TV OSD button focus when unable to pause[CR]- Fixes to DialogSelect[CR]- Fix no items in Ask Default Background selection on new installs[CR]- Drop Skin Helper Widgets for favorites and use favourites:// path instead[CR]- Update and add some missing icons[CR]- Fix Netherlands rating classification images[CR]- Update and re-design PVR Group Manager[CR]- Fix Menu resetting to defaults[CR]- Add TMDb search from DialogVideoInfo Extras on Home screen[CR]- Fix missing icon/poster in SlimList[CR]- PVR updates and additions[CR]- Updated language files from Transifex[CR]- Revert removal of bottom OSD button position[CR]- Add option to use Skin Info Service for Movie Set Plots in Video Info[CR]- Fix default letter jump appearing on side menu settings button focus[CR]- Add "fixed" option for video RightList[CR]- Tweak Vertical Menu fixed behaviour to match Horizontal[CR]- Rework Live TV guide with icons from Estuary and re-add channel logos[CR]- Add disable to submenu items in Main Menu Customizer[CR]- Add information setting to SlimList[CR]- Remove script.extendedinfo and add script.embuary.info support[CR]- Add DialogVideoInfo for sets[CR]- Add some v19 skin engine changes[CR]- Use script.embuary.helper for Similiar and Directer movies in DialogVideoInfo[CR]- Add missing PVR label to Widget info[CR]- Add Glow Bars and System Glow Bars to color customizer[CR]- Add Jump to Letter bar to Video library using script.embuary.helper[CR]- Fix playlist backgrounds for Main Menu not following user set rotation speed[CR]- Redesign DialogExtendedProgressBar and DialogVolumeBar[CR]- Make OSD buttons on top default and remove option[CR]- Redesign PlayerProcessInfo[CR]- Clean up Main Menu and Widget Customizers[CR]- Fill empty space with more info in some views[CR][CR][B]All updates may contain various changes and/or improvements[/B][CR][I][COLOR FFFF0202]Please give credit to all the devolopers (Especially Mike) that has shared most of these changes. Also all others that have and do contribute to this skin![/COLOR][/I]

Falling Seasons[/COLOR][CR][COLOR FFE67300]Included with v7.9.4 Silvo update by Mike[/COLOR][CR]- Fix Live TV OSD button focus when unable to pause[CR]- Fixes to DialogSelect[CR]- Fix no items in Ask Default Background selection on new installs[CR]- Drop Skin Helper Widgets for favorites and use favourites:// path instead[CR]- Update and add some missing icons[CR]- Fix Netherlands rating classification images[CR]- Update and re-design PVR Group Manager[CR]- Fix Menu resetting to defaults[CR]- Add TMDb search from DialogVideoInfo Extras on Home screen[CR]- Fix missing icon/poster in SlimList[CR]- PVR updates and additions[CR]- Updated language files from Transifex[CR]- Revert removal of bottom OSD button position[CR]- Add option to use Skin Info Service for Movie Set Plots in Video Info[CR]- Fix default letter jump appearing on side menu settings button focus[CR]- Add "fixed" option for video RightList[CR]- Tweak Vertical Menu fixed behaviour to match Horizontal[CR]- Rework Live TV guide with icons from Estuary and re-add channel logos[CR]- Add disable to submenu items in Main Menu Customizer[CR]- Add information setting to SlimList[CR]- Remove script.extendedinfo and add script.embuary.info support[CR]- Add DialogVideoInfo for sets[CR]- Add some v19 skin engine changes[CR]- Use script.embuary.helper for Similiar and Directer movies in DialogVideoInfo[CR]- Add missing PVR label to Widget info[CR]- Add Glow Bars and System Glow Bars to color customizer[CR]- Add Jump to Letter bar to Video library using script.embuary.helper[CR]- Fix playlist backgrounds for Main Menu not following user set rotation speed[CR]- Redesign DialogExtendedProgressBar and DialogVolumeBar[CR]- Make OSD buttons on top default and remove option[CR]- Redesign PlayerProcessInfo[CR]- Clean up Main Menu and Widget Customizers[CR]- Fill empty space with more info in some views[CR][CR][B]All updates may contain various changes and/or improvements[/B][CR][I][COLOR FFFF0202]Please give credit to all the devolopers (Especially Mike) that has shared most of these changes. Also all others that have and do contribute to this skin![/COLOR][/I]
